short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks login when you load the moodle for UMass Amherst.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a student at UMass Amherst? Do you use Moodle? If you answered yes to both of these questions and are tired of Moodle logging you out every two seconds this extension is for you. When you load Moodle it will click the login button for you so you never have to again.
